mapper.sql: STOCKID, COMMODITYID, STORAGENUM, FORZENNUM, AVAILABLENUM, OUTBOUNDNUM,WAREHOUSEID
mapper.insert:
SELECT to_char(SEQ_IPO_WAREHOUSE_STOCK.NEXTVAL) FROM dual
insert into IPO_WAREHOUSE_STOCK ( ) values (#{stockid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commodityid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storagenum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{forzennum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{availablenum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{outboundnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{warehouseid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}) )
